helpSteps.content: Download allows you to view and manage items in the current selection as well see your previous downloads
This tab shows your current selection for download
This tab shows the status of previous downloads
Shows all the items you have selected
You can remove single items by using the remove button
Click here to remove all the selected items in one click
Click here to download the selection of results shown above
